name: THRUSTHAMMER
description:
With recent advances in asteroid mining technology, there has been a revelation. Who wants to sit around for years chipping away at an asteroid for only a little bit of profit? Nobody! So instead of being careful, how about you just vaporize the entire thing in an instant.

Enter stage left,  the THRUSTHAMMER. A massive reinforced hunk of metal with huge thrusters on either side. A highly efficient machine for sure, but it takes a skilled pilot to use it effectively

Controls:

  • (Browser) Hold X / LMB or Z / RMB to rotate clockwise and counter-clockwise
  • (Phone) Hold the left or right side of the screen to rotate clockwise and counter-clockwise
